title: Hyundai Alcazar facelift launched in India: Check Price, key features, engine details & more
description: Hyundai Alcazar Facelift: Hyundai Motor India has launched the 2024 version of its three-row SUV, the Alcazar, with updated cosmetic features and technology. Priced from Rs 14.99 lakh for the turbo petrol and Rs 15.99 lakh for the diesel variant, the new Alcazar features quad-beam LED headlamps, redesigned 18-inch alloy wheels, and functional roof rails.
